arts.ttl: Portugal vs Armenia – World Cup qualifier preview and team news
arts.sum: Portugal host Armenia in their final World Cup qualifier on Sunday as they look to book their spot at next summer’s tournament in North America. Roberto Martinez’ side need to bounce back from a shock 2-0 defeat to the Republic of Ireland on Thursday, a loss that halted their impressive unbeaten run and saw Cristiano […] The post Portugal vs Armenia – World Cup qualifier preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.
